body:
#970 Windows 8 x64 and the Overlay

The DxDiag.txt is not showing the correct video card.  (I have 2 installed.)
The video card being used in-game is:

Nvidia GeForce GTX 675MX / 4GB GDDR5
Running the current drivers set.

#970 Windows 8 x64 and the Overlay

- **labels**: Overview --> overlay, windows
- **Release**: 1.2.4-RC --> 1.2.5

#970 Windows 8 x64 and the Overlay

May have been fixed through 84307bb6606411b20c393e0424f23e9ba96afaac .
Waiting for snapshots after 1.2.4 to be able to confirm / reproduce.

#970 Windows 8 x64 and the Overlay

- **summary**: Windows 8 x64 and the Overview --> Windows 8 x64 and the Overlay
- Description has changed:

Diff:

~~~~

--- old
+++ new
@@ -1,4 +1,4 @@
-I an unable to get the overview to show when playing ARMA2: DayZ Mod.
-I am launching DayZ through DayZ Commander, with the "Force Direc3D 9" option ON, forcing ARMA to run in DirectX 9.  (I know that the overview will not work in DX11.)
+I am unable to get the overlay to show when playing ARMA2: DayZ Mod.
+I am launching DayZ through DayZ Commander, with the "Force Direc3D 9" option ON, forcing ARMA to run in DirectX 9. (I know that the overlay will not work in DX11.)
 
 I have also used the "-nod3d9ex" switch to no effect.

~~~~
